jd: From: Sanjay, K&K Global Talent Solutions Inc sanjay48@knkglobaltalents.com Reply to: sanjay48@knkglobaltalents.com Job Title: SAS Business Analyst Location: Pittsburgh, PA/onsite Experience: 10+ years Description: Responsible for developing and managing SAS and SQL reporting solutions and delivery, including both the planning and design of new solutions to support the department?s reporting requirements, ongoing management, production support, monitoring, and accountability for those solutions Engage with business stakeholders and advise strategic solutions for their business intelligence needs Understand how the delivery of the MI captured Requirements should be documented to assist technicians to build the functional/ integration component Delivery is expected through an Agile delivery model delivering the outputs on the Teradata(database), Informatica and SAS (ETL) and Qlik (presentation layer) Design, track and interpret key performance indicators and analytical models driving Field Operations strategy and productivity Recommend and establish action plans based on such indicators/models to mitigate risks and optimize Field performance Prepare upper management for strategy discussions, weekly and monthly results Create/maintain static and Ad-Hoc deliverables to communicate field performance and increase technician level efficiency Compile/mine data from multiple business sources Competencies: Digital : BI- Fundamentals of Business Analytics using SAS, Agile Way of Working
